snippet: Lesson | We celebrate 2012 graduates with help from the Flocabulary video "The Last 18 Years in Rap," as well as teaching ideas and links to Times articles about commencement speeches from 1901 to 2012.
abstract: Lesson | We celebrate 2012 graduates with help from the Flocabulary video "The Last 18 Years in Rap," as well as teaching ideas and links to Times articles about commencement speeches from 1901 to 2012.

headline.main: Commencement 2012: ‘18 Years in Rap' and Some Teaching Ideas
